text: Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you’ve got a kingdom.
author: Jack LaLanne

text: The groundwork for all happiness is good health.
author: Leigh Hunt

text: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
author: John F. Kennedy

text: Health is a state of body. Wellness is a state of being.
author: J. Stanford

text: The greatest wealth is health.
author: Virgil

text: To keep the body in good health is a duty...otherwise we shall not be able to keep the mind strong and clear.
author: Buddha

text: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It’s about being better than you used to be.
author: Khloe Kardashian

text: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

text: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest medicine of all is to teach people how not to need it.
author: Hippocrates

text: A man’s health can be judged by which he takes two at a time – pills or stairs.
author: Joan Welsh

text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

text: If you don’t make time for exercise, you’ll probably have to make time for illness.
author: Robin Sharma

text: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

text: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
author: John F. Kennedy

text: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.

text: In fitness, there are no shortcuts. It involves immense discipline and hard work.
author: Mahesh Babu

text: Fitness is not a destination it is a way of life.
author: Unknown

text: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Unknown

text: Take care of your body, it's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Health is a relationship between you and your body.
author: Terri Guillemets

text: You don’t have to be extreme, just consistent.
author: Anonymous

text: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Unknown

text: The first wealth is health.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
author: Mark Twain

text: True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are united.
author: Alexander von Humboldt

text: The greatest wealth is health.
author: Unknown

text: It's not about perfect. It's about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that's where transformation happens. That's how change occurs.

text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
